channel.title: CVE Feed for Ryan Grove -- sanitize (ruby gem)

item.title: CVE-2018-3740|2024-08-05T04:50:30.616Z -- ryan%20grove -- sanitize%20%28ruby%20gem%29
item.description: A specially crafted HTML fragment can cause Sanitize gem for Ruby to allow non-whitelisted attributes to be used on a whitelisted HTML element.
